text: Why don't we just shoot him?

text: You dumbass, Cartman! It has to look natural, or else we'll all get busted.

title: DEATH
text: Yeah, stupid.

title: DEATH
role: The boys pull on the rope and the cow gets hoisted up over
text: grandpa.

title: DEATH
text: That's good, Billy... A little higher now...

title: DEATH
role: The cow dangles in the air. The boys wrap their end of the
text: rope around the base of another tree.

title: DEATH
role: Kyle's mother walks up to the news cameras and the
text: microphones.

title: DEATH
text: The network isn't taking us seriously. In the past, people have had to die for what they believed in, and we are prepared to do the same. Ready?

title: DEATH
role: The people near the sling shot all nod.

title: DEATH
text: Mr. McKormick, you shall be a martyr to us all. God speed.

title: DEATH
text: WE WILL NOT LET THESE CORPORATE HALFWITS RUIN OUR CHILDREN'S MINDS!! LAUNCH!!!

title: DEATH
role: The sling shot is cut, Mr. McKormick goes flying into the
text: air and hits SPLAT!! into the side of the Toon Central building, dying instantly.

title: DEATH
text: We will all follow suit! One by one if that's what it takes!!

title: DEATH
role: The line to the port-o-potties is getting longer. People
text: moan with stomach aches.

title: DEATH
role: The cow dangles dangerously above grandpa. The other end of
text: the rope is tied around a tree.

title: DEATH
role: Stan holds a knife in his hand, ready to cut the rope, and
text: send the cow on top of his grandfather.

title: DEATH
text: Are you ready grandpa?

title: DEATH
text: Does the Pope crap in the woods?

title: DEATH
role: Stan is about to cut the rope when suddenly, a light flashes!

title: DEATH
role: The boys all look over at the road, where Officer Barbrady
text: has pulled up in his patrol car.

title: DEATH
role: Barbrady studies the scene from his car, he looks at the
text: cow, the grandpa below it, Stan with the knife in his hand...

title: DEATH
role: The boys' eyes all grow wide.

title: DEATH
text: ...Carry on.

title: DEATH
role: Barbrady drives away. The boys all sigh.

title: DEATH
text: Okay, here we go... Bye Grandpa, it was nice knowing you.

title: DEATH
text: Cut the damn rope already!

title: DEATH
role: But now another FLASH!! This one is HUGE. The boys all reel
text: back from its glow.

title: DEATH
text: Whoa, what is that?!

title: DEATH
role: When the smoke clears, the boys see a tall figure, dressed
text: in black and carrying a sythe.

title: DEATH
text: Whoa... It looks like... death!

title: DEATH
text: It's about time you late ass lazy son of a whore!

title: DEATH
text: Come on! Let's go!

title: DEATH
role: But death walks past grandpa and heads towards the boys.

title: DEATH
text: What the --

title: DEATH
text: Hey, he's coming towards US!

title: DEATH
text: Why is Death coming after us?

title: DEATH
role: But death relentlessly heads for the boys. The boys all scream
text: and run.

title: DEATH
role: The boys run inside. Death is just behind them. It makes a
text: horrible sound.

title: DEATH
text: Mrrrrr...

title: DEATH
role: The boys all run up into Stan's room and slam the door shut.
text: Death is just on the other side, pounding on the door.

title: DEATH
text: Help, run run run!

title: DEATH
text: What are we gonna do?!

title: DEATH
role: Stan looks over at his telephone.

title: DEATH
text: As the day progresses, more and more South Park residents continue to sling shot their bodies into the side of the Toon Central building.

title: DEATH
role: Behind him, an OLD LADY flies through the air and splats
text: into the building.

title: DEATH
text: Toon Central is under incredible pressure to cancel the show, and has already lost over 20 percent of their sponsors...

title: DEATH
role: Kyle's mother walks up to Stan's mother and hands her a cell
text: phone.

title: DEATH
text: Here, Carol, I think it's your boy.

title: DEATH
text: Oh, thanks. (Into the phone) What is it, Stanly hon? Did you break something?

title: DEATH
text: Mom, death is here and he's trying to take all of us away with him.

title: DEATH
role: The boys all look worriedly at the door which is still
text: pounding and shaking.

title: DEATH
text: Stanly honey, you need to leave Mommy alone, I'm doing something very very important for your little well-being there.

title: DEATH
text: Yeah, but mom --

title: DEATH
text: Here honey, talk to your father.

title: DEATH
role: Stan's dad gets on the phone.

title: DEATH
text: Did you turn the heat down?

title: DEATH
text: Dad, death is coming --

title: DEATH
text: Keep the thermostat under 70. Take care of your grandfather.

title: DEATH
role: Stan hangs up the phone. Death starts carving away at the
text: door with his sicle.

title: DEATH
text: Dammit! You know, I think that if parents would spend less time worrying about what their kids watch on T.V. and more time worrying about what's going on in their kids' lives, this world would be a much better place.

title: DEATH
text: Yes, I think that parents get only get so offended by television because they rely on it as a babysitter and the sole educator of their kids.

title: DEATH
text: Mph rmph rm rmph rm rmph mmm rmph mph mph rmp mm.

title: DEATH
text: Totally dude.

title: DEATH
text: Good point man.

title: DEATH
role: Suddenly death BURSTS THROUGH THE DOOR!!!

title: DEATH
text: AAGH!!

title: DEATH
text: Quick! Jump out the window!!

title: DEATH
role: Just before Death can reach them, the boys jump out the
text: window.

title: DEATH
role: The boys run screaming down South Park avenue. Death pursues
text: them on a tricycle.

title: DEATH
role: Grandpa is pursuing Death in his wheelchair.

title: DEATH
text: Come back here you pompass son of a panzy!

title: DEATH
role: Slowly, Death catches up to the boys, he stretches out his
text: bony hand...

title: DEATH
text: AAGH!!

title: DEATH
text: Don't let him touch you! You die if he touches you!!

title: DEATH
text: I'm over here you son of a whore!

title: DEATH
role: Death chases the boys past a TV shop, where dozens of TVs
text: are on in the window.

title: DEATH
role: They are all playing Terrance and Phillip.

title: DEATH
role: Terrance and Phillip are floating through space with little
text: space suits on.

title: DEATH
text: Oh Terrance... What color is the wind?

title: DEATH
text: I don't know why don't you check --

title: DEATH
role: Terrance turns his ass towards Phillip and farts.

title: DEATH
text: OH! YOU FARTED!!

title: DEATH
role: Death laughs loudly. He has to lay down his scythe to hold
text: his stomach.

title: DEATH
text: Hey Phillip, you know what my space suit smells like?

title: DEATH
text: No, Terrance, why don't you tell me.

title: DEATH
text: Well, it smells like... A dirty fart!

title: DEATH
role: They laugh. Death laughs even harder.

title: DEATH
text: Hey look!

title: DEATH
role: The boys stop running and notice that death is watching the
text: show.

title: DEATH
role: Everybody gathers around the TV and watches. Laughing happily
text: together.

title: DEATH
role: The reporter is standing out front of the Toon Central
text: building.

title: DEATH
text: Hours have passed and still the die hard South Park parents are killing themselves in front of the Toon Central building one by one.

title: DEATH
role: Another person splats into the side of the building.

title: DEATH
text: Worse yet, the stomach flu that seems to be going around is... Wait, wait... I'm getting word that John Warsog, the president of the network is going to make a statement!

title: DEATH
role: Warsog again takes the stand, just as another MAN is about
text: to be released from the sling shot. A look of relief crosses the man's face.

title: DEATH
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, your Nazi-esque tactics of trying to stink us out with your rancid feces... has worked.

title: DEATH
role: The people look confused. The port-o-potties are indeed backed
text: up.

title: DEATH
text: Therefore, today we will officially be taking 'Terrance and Phillip' off the network, and replacing it with reruns of 'She's The Sheriff.' Starring Suzanne Summers.

title: DEATH
role: The people all rejoice and cheer.

title: DEATH
text: Now get away from here and take your diarrhea with you!

title: DEATH
role: The townspeople all cheer and rejoice. The two guys at the
text: sling shot accidentally let it go, and the man goes flying into the air and splats against the building.

title: DEATH
text: Now at last we can return to normality!

title: DEATH
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TV SHOP - NIGHT

title: DEATH
role: The boys and death are still happily watching Terrance and
text: Phillip.

title: DEATH
text: Hey Phillip.

title: DEATH
text: Yes Terrance.

title: DEATH
text: Is there a penny stuck in my butt?

title: DEATH
text: I don't know Terrance, let me check...

title: DEATH
text: Oh, oh. Don't look there Phillip, you're going to get farted on!!

title: DEATH
role: Phillip moves his head towards Terrance's ass when suddenly
text: FWOOP! A second of static and then the Toon Central logo.

title: DEATH
role: The boys and death look confused.

title: DEATH
text: We interrupt this program to bring you some loud static.

title: DEATH
role: Death goes absolutely ballistic. It lets out a horrible cry.

title: DEATH
text: MARRRR!!!!!

title: DEATH
role: And turns back on the boys.

title: DEATH
text: AAGH!!

title: DEATH
role: Death stretches out its skeleton hand and touches Kenny.

title: DEATH
role: Kenny immediately falls to the ground.

title: DEATH
text: Oh my God! They killed Kenny!!

title: DEATH
role: The boys stop and look at Kenny's motionless body.

title: DEATH
text: (To Death) You bastard!!

title: DEATH
text: Wow, I guess Death was just coming after Kenny the whole time.

title: DEATH
text: HEY! You were supposed to kill ME!!

title: DEATH
text: That's not fair, God Dammit! My grandpa asked me to kill him and I did it!

title: DEATH
role: Death says nothing, but points his boney finger to a glowing
text: fog.

title: DEATH
text: Whoa...

title: DEATH
role: In the glowing fog, another EXTREMELY OLDER man appears,
text: floating above the ground.

title: DEATH
text: Billy...

title: DEATH
text: Grandpa?

title: DEATH
text: That's right, Billy.

title: DEATH
text: My name's not Billy, Grandpa! And what's wrong with you? Why do you look all haggard?

title: DEATH
text: I asked you to kill me, Billy, but I was wrong... And now I am forced to spend eternity in limbo.

title: DEATH
text: Limbo?

title: DEATH
text: I was wrong to put you in that position, Billy. Just like you're wrong to put little Billy in it now. You're so obsessed with ending your life, you're not thinking about what you're doing to his.

title: DEATH
text: You must wait to die of natural causes.

title: DEATH
text: But I've been waiting for twenty- five years! Let nature run its course, or else end up in limbo...

title: DEATH
role: The old old man starts to fade away. He, death and Kenny all
text: float up to the sky.

title: DEATH
text: Natural causes, Billy... Natural causes...

title: DEATH
text: C'mon you guys, let's go home.

title: DEATH
role: Rats come and pull Kenny away.

title: DEATH
role: Stan's mom and dad walk in the door. Kyle's mom is with them.

title: DEATH
text: Here they are!

title: DEATH
text: Well, we did it son! We have fought a battle for your well-being and won!

title: DEATH
text: What do you mean?

title: DEATH
text: We got Terrance and Phillip taken off the air!

title: DEATH
role: The boys all look terribly disappointed.

title: DEATH
text: (To Kyle) You son of a bitch! Your mom sucks!

title: DEATH
text: But look what they put on!

title: DEATH
role: Kyle's mother flips on the television.

title: DEATH
text: And now back to 'She's the Sheriff!'!

title: DEATH
text: NOOOOO!!!! GOD NOOOOOO!!!!!

title: DEATH
text: You were the one behind all these shenanigans!

title: DEATH
text: Yeah, well, you're the stupid ho that started it.

title: DEATH
text: What did he say?

title: DEATH
text: Up yours, buttmunch!

title: DEATH
role: The parents are all staring at the T.V. Kyle's mom is furious.

title: DEATH
text: WHAT-WHAT-WHAAAT?!?!

title: DEATH
role: Kyle's mother picks her sign back up.

title: DEATH
text: Come on everybody! Back to New York!!

title: DEATH
role: The parents all dash out the door.

title: DEATH
text: Hey Stan, now that Terrance and Phillip has been taken off the air, what are we going to do for entertainment?

title: DEATH
text: I dunno... We could start breathing gas fumes...

title: DEATH
text: My uncle says that smoking crack is kinda cool...

title: DEATH
text: Hey! Why don't we go watch some of those porno movie thingies?

title: DEATH
text: Cool!

title: DEATH
text: Yeah!

title: DEATH
role: Grandpa wheels out wearing tourist garb and holding pamphlets.

title: DEATH
text: What are you doing grandpa?

title: DEATH
text: I'm planning a trip to Africa. Did you know over 400 people are eaten naturally by lions in Africa every year?

title: DEATH
text: That's my silly grandpa!

title: DEATH
role: The boys all laugh and fart.
